welcome.title: Welcome to ROMA Services
welcome.text: Located at 142 rue de Clignancout 75018 in the PARIS area, RomaServices is your trusted partner for assembly and disassembly of metal structures, as well as painting and cleaning services. We operate in Île-de-France on all types of sites, whether new builds, renovations or industrial sites. Our experienced team is committed to ensuring safety and access for workers on your sites while allowing them to work in the best conditions. At RomaServices we pride ourselves on offering quality services tailored to your specific needs. Trust our expertise to ensure the success of your projects.

about.cgvContent:
Article I

The equipment and its accessories mentioned in the rental agreement are rented for a specified period on the front. This period is renewable.

Article II

The rental price of the equipment is payable in monthly installments, the first of which must be paid on the day the rental agreement is signed and the other installments on the first day of the following month. A deposit is required for any rented equipment.
The deposit paid upon taking possession of the rented equipment must not be considered a payment on the rental price as long as the equipment has not been returned.

Article III

The tenant may not claim any reduction in rent or compensation of any kind in the event of non-use of the rented equipment, for any reason whatsoever; no day is deductible, such as Sundays, holidays, strikes, bad weather, etc., these risks being borne by the tenant.

Article IV

The maintenance of the equipment is the responsibility of the tenant. The lessor, or any person designated by him, will always have the possibility during the rental period to carry out any checks concerning the use of the equipment.

Article V

When the equipment is assembled by us:

  • The tenant must not in any case make any modification to the assembly and arrival of the scaffolding.
  • Once the work is finished by the tenant, the dismantling must be done only by us.
  • Shutters, electronic signs, neon lights, etc., must be dismantled by the tenant before the assembly of the scaffolding.
  • Road permits as well as scaffolding lighting are the responsibility of the tenant. We disclaim any liability in case of fine or accident.

Article VI

The roofs on which the lessor will have to place the scaffolding are deemed solid; otherwise, the lessor disclaims any liability for any damage caused.

Article VII

The tenant must confirm in writing to the lessor seven calendar days before the end of use of the scaffolding which ensures its dismantling as soon as possible; the tenant will ensure the guarding of the equipment until it is completely removed by the lessor.

Article VIII

The tenant assumes all risks of deterioration and partial or total loss of the equipment, whatever the cause, even if it is a fortuitous case. Deteriorated or lost equipment will be charged at the prices in force on the day the equipment should have been returned.

Article IX

The equipment is rented clean: it must be returned as such; with regard to rolling scaffolds, ropes or cables must be returned coiled. Otherwise, cleaning and coiling will be charged by the time according to our current rate.
The tenant must necessarily take out an insurance policy on behalf of the owner covering the rented equipment against the most common risks, theft, fire, breakage, explosion, etc., and for its actual value. In case of a claim and insufficient compensation paid by the insurance company, the tenant will be required to supplement this compensation so that the owner suffers no damage.

Article X

The rental agreement will be executed automatically, without any formality, eight days after sending the tenant a registered letter of formal notice remaining without effect:

  • In case of non-payment of a single rent installment on the due date.
  • In case of non-performance by the tenant of a single provision of the general and particular rental conditions.
In this event, the tenant must return the equipment immediately to the owner, and all costs paid by the owner for terminating the contract will be borne exclusively by the tenant.

Article XI

The tenant acknowledges that at the time the rental began the rented equipment was in perfect working order.
The tenant must immediately report any defect that he may notice.
